it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.common.modelviews

Class SquareView

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.common.modelviews.SquareView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AmmoSquareView, SpawnSquareView

    public abstract class SquareView
extends Object
implements Serializable
    A lightweight representation of a square in the view
    Author:
    Tiziano Fucci, Lorenzo Farinelli
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SquareView(CoordPair location, RoomColor roomColor)
      Creates a new square view

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addPlayer(String player)
      Add a player inside the square If the provided player is null, nothing happens
      Map<CardinalDirection,SquareConnectionType> getAdjacentMap()
      Retrieves the map of adjacency of the square
      CoordPair getLocation()
      Retrieve the location of the square in cartesian coordinates
      Set<String> getPlayers()
      Retrieves the players inside the square
      RoomColor getRoomColor()
      Retrieves the color of the room the square is inside
      abstract String printSquareContent()
      Retrieves a textual representation of the content inside the square
      abstract String printTypeMarker()
      Retrieves the marker indicating the type of the square Each subclass of SquareView will print a different marker
      void removePlayer(String player)
      Remove a player from the square If the provided player is null or not present, nothing happens
      void setAdjacentMap(Map<CardinalDirection,SquareConnectionType> adjacentMap)
      Sets the map of adjacency of the square If the provided map is null, nothing happens
      void setPlayers(Set<String> players)
      Sets the players inside the square If a null object is provided, nothing happens

        Remove a player from the square If the provided player is null or not present, nothing happens
